clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Surgical resection: anatomic lobectomy with lymph node dissection
Neoadjuvant or adjuvant therapy: Toripalimab plus platinum-based chemotherapy (for immunotherapy) or Osimertinib (for EGFR mutation-positive)

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Test for EGFR mutations to guide Osimertinib use
Test PD-L1 expression to guide immunotherapy selection

clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Radical concurrent chemoradiotherapy (cisplatin plus etoposide or pemetrexed), followed by consolidation therapy with Durvalumab or Sugemalimab

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: IV stage NSCLC with EGFR mutation
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: First-line: Osimertinib or Befotertinib; For T790M-positive: Befotertinib; For exon 20 insertion: Amivantamab plus chemotherapy (third-line) or Surufatinib (later-line)

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Mandatory testing for all IV stage non-squamous NSCLC; use tissue NGS or ctDNA if tissue insufficient
Re-biopsy upon EGFR-TKI resistance to identify T790M mutation

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: IV stage NSCLC with ALK fusion
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: First-line: Alectinib, Brigatinib, Lorlatinib, or Iluacitinib; Later-line: Iluacitinib after Crizotinib resistance

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Mandatory testing for all IV stage non-squamous NSCLC; use NGS for detection

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: IV stage NSCLC with ROS1 fusion

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Mandatory testing for all IV stage NSCLC; use NGS

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: IV stage NSCLC with other driver mutations (e.g., RET fusion, MET exon 14 skipping)
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: First-line for RET fusion: Selpercatinib or Pralsetinib; Later-line for MET exon 14 skipping: Glumetinib, Tepotinib, or Bometinib

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Test for RET fusions; NGS recommended
Test for MET mutations; tissue biopsy preferred

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: IV stage NSCLC without driver mutations (non-squamous)
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: First-line: Pembrolizumab monotherapy if PD-L1 ≥50%; or platinum-based chemotherapy plus immunotherapy (e.g., Pembrolizumab, Camrelizumab, Sintilimab) if PD-L1 <50%

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Mandatory testing for PD-L1 expression (TPS or TC/IC score) using approved IHC methods; threshold: TPS ≥50% for monotherapy

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: IV stage NSCLC without driver mutations (squamous)
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: First-line: Pembrolizumab if PD-L1 ≥50%; or platinum-based chemotherapy plus immunotherapy

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Test PD-L1 expression to guide treatment choice

clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Surgery or stereotactic radiotherapy plus systemic therapy; for bone metastases: local radiotherapy plus bisphosphonates

biomarker_clinical_significance.clinical_significance: Predicts efficacy of targeted therapy and immunotherapy; e.g., EGFR mutations indicate response to EGFR-TKIs (ORR 60-80%), ALK fusions predict benefit from ALK inhibitors (PFS up to 34.8 months), PD-L1 high expression correlates with improved OS with immunotherapy. Biomarker status guides personalized treatment selection and resistance management.
